subsections.title: Fractions
subsections.content: Fractions represent parts of a whole.
points: Denominator: total parts in the whole.
Operations: addition and subtraction need common denominators.

subsections.title: Decimals
subsections.content: Decimals represent fractions using base-10 notation.
points: Convert fractions to decimals by division.
Decimals are easier to use in addition, subtraction, multiplication.
Place value is important for understanding decimals.

subsections.title: Conversion Between Fractions and Decimals
subsections.content: How to convert fractions to decimals and vice versa.
points: Divide numerator by denominator to get decimal.
Decimal to fraction by reading place value and simplifying.

subsections.title: Components of Expressions
points: Terms are separated by + or - signs.

subsections.title: Simplification
subsections.content: Combine like terms to simplify expressions.
points: Only terms with the same variables can be combined.

subsections.title: Distributive Property
subsections.content: Distribute multiplication over addition or subtraction.

subsections.title: Perimeter
subsections.content: The total length around a shape.
points: Triangle perimeter = sum of all sides.

subsections.title: Area
subsections.content: The space enclosed within a shape.
